snippet.title: Darkwood Live-Action Trailer
snippet.description:
ADD DARKWOOD TO YOUR WISHLIST: http://store.steampowered.com/app/274520/

Full version coming AUGUST 17th.

Want to REVIEW or STREAM the game? Check out:
https://www.keymailer.co/g/games/11771 - Keymailer
https://aws.promoterapp.com/pub/press/darkwood - Promoter

Darkwood provides a new perspective on survival horror. 

Scavenge and explore the rich, ever-changing free-roam world by day, then hunker down in your hideout and pray for the morning light.

Darkwood is available for Windows, Mac OSX and Linux.

Make sure to:
- like us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/AcidWizardStudio
- and follow us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/TheAcidWizard  to stay up to date!

Director - Krzysztof Grajper
Director of Photography - Olaf Malinowski

Production - FILM FICTION Adrian Pawłowski (http://www.film-fiction.com, http://www.facebook.com/filmfiction)
Producer - Adrian Pawłowski / FILM FICTION
Production Manager - Maciek Kowalczyk / FILM FICTION

Client - Acid Wizard Studio

Cast - Sabina Kontor, Marcin Steczkowski

Offline - Tomasz Bochniak

Color correction - Coloroffon
Post-producer - Magda Widuch, Anna Stefanek, Monika Piotrowska / Coloroffon
Colorist - Katarzyna Żebrowska / Coloroffon

Online - LocoMotive
Post-producer - Paulina Legodzińska, Martyna Słomińska / LocoMotive
Online - Marek Jasiński / LocoMotive
Sound design - Głośno
Sound Design - Błażej Kafarski, Darek Podhajski / Głośno
Music - Piotr Adamczyk

Set Design - Katarzyna Pielużek
Make-up Artist - Ewelina Mróz
Costume Designer - Kamila Jankowska

Camera Set - Mateusz Wajda / MX35
Ronin Operator - Michał Chrząstek
Light - Heliograf

Stage Hand - Rafał Malinowski

Special THX - Marek Mentel, Eugeniusz Filimoniuk, Baśka Miszczyk, Marek Mrocza, Małgorzata Zieniuk, Ewa Bednarska, Jędrek Dziedzic, Bartek Kowalski, Małgorzata Figat, Krzysztof Kiziewicz
